title: This 250-Million-Year-Old Fossil Is Rewriting the Origin of Mammalian Hearing
description: Advanced biomechanical modeling shows that early mammal ancestors likely used an eardrum to hear airborne sounds 250 million years ago. The rise of sensitive hearing marked a major turning point in mammal evolution. The mammalian middle ear, which includes an eardrum and several tiny bones, makes it possible to detect a wide range of sounds [...]

title: SteelPeak Wealth LLC Invests $501,000 in SPDR S&P Fossil Fuel Reserves Free ETF $SPYX
